full_text:
Francisco Javier "Frank" Duarte  is a Chilean-born laser physicist and author/editor of several well-known books on tunable lasers and quantum optics. He introduced the generalized multiple-prism dispersion theory and has discovered various multiple-prism grating oscillator laser configurations. These contributions have found applications in a variety of fields including:
atomic vapor laser isotope separation,
laser medicine,
laser microscopy,
laser pulse compression,
laser spectroscopy,
tunable diode lasers.
Duarte's research has mainly focused on physical and laser optics and has taken place at a number institutions in academia, industry, and the defense establishment.
title: F. J. Duarte
